Description:
Detects usage of the "sc.exe" utility adding a new service with special permission seen used by threat actors which makes the service hidden and unremovable.

Author: Andreas Hunkeler (@Karneades)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Service DACL Abuse To Hide Services Via Sc.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\sc.exe' and original_file_name = 'sc.exe') and (command like '%sdset%' and command like '%dclcwpdtsd%'))
